title: Designing Engagement Assessment for Online Classes Based on Blended Learning Activities

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with basic digital learning tools and understanding of online learning environments
context.additional_context: Formative Assessment-Centered Operation Using Digital Devices for Social Studies Curriculum Management Targeting Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four categories (cognitive, emotional, behavioral, and social engagement) for assessing online class participation.
Learners can design blended learning activities (e.g., discussions, collaborative tasks, reflective journals) and measure engagement metrics within a 10% error margin.
Learners can develop a class participation plan aligned with the Carnegie-unit standard (8,100 minutes).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
